text: Ivvāṟē iṇai vaippōril perumpālōrukku, avarkaḷuṭaiya kuḻantaikaḷaiyē kolai ceyvatai avarkaḷuṭaiya teyvaṅkaḷ aḻakākki vaittuḷḷaṉa. Avarkaḷai nācappaṭutti, avarkaḷuṭaiya mārkkattaiyum kuḻappattilākkiviṭṭaṉa. Allāh nāṭiyiruntāl avarkaḷ appaṭic ceytirukka māṭṭārkaḷ. Eṉavē (napiyē!) Nīr avarkaḷaiyum, avarkaḷuṭaiya poyyāṉa kūṟṟukkaḷaiyum viṭṭu vilaki viṭuvīrāka
